expo.name: Life Changing Journey
expo.description: A lifestyle companion app connecting users with local wellness professionals, business services, and community resources in Durban, South Africa.

infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to provide personalized wellness content.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app may use the camera for profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access photos for profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app may use location to show nearby services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app may use location to show nearby services.
